subtitle: Cajun spices add a pungent taste and the salmon is blackened in butter in this recipe.

method.text: Put the cajun spice, onion and garlic in a blender or food processor. Whizz until blended.
Heat the butter in a frying pan until bubbling. Add the salmon fillets. Fry for 5 min. Turn over and cook for 3-4 min until salmon feels firm to the touch.

title: Cajun salmon
